text: Fernand Joseph St. Germain (January 9, 1928 â€“ August 16, 2014) was an American politician. He served as a U.S. Representative from Rhode Island. He served as a representative from January 3, 1961 through January 3, 1989. St. Germain died on August 16, 2014 at his home in Newport, Rhode Island, aged 86. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Lawyers from Massachusetts Category:Boston University alumni Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:United States representatives from Rhode Island Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Rhode Island
title: Fernand St. Germain
